'''''Ancient Colors''''' is a [[World Quest]] Chapter in [[Fontaine]].

This Quest Series is referred to as '''Seymour's Story: Prologue''' in the Fontaine [[Reputation]] menu.

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[A Brush of Seafoam and Crimson]]
* Act II - [[A Gradient of Dreams and Ochre]]
* Act III - [[Blue Longing of Heart and Moon]]
